topic.title: How to Open a Document on WebDAV Server

li.p: There are three ways to open a document from WebDAV server:
This is the usual way to open the document from WebDAV location. Select Document WebDAV Open...
This is useful when you want to open text file or broken XML document from WebDAV location. Select Document WebDAV Open as Plain Text...

li.b: Open XML document with a specific template
li.p: Sometimes Serna is unable to guess proper document template, or you may want to open the document with a specific template. In this case Select Document WebDAV Open with Template...
The WebDAV Open Document Dialog will show up. In the editbox Collection URL.. specify the URL with the path where the document resides and hit Enter.

note.p: Make sure you specify the path where the document resides, but not the document URL. E.g. if the document URL is http://myserver:8080/dav/project/1.xml, then specify: http://myserver:8080/dav/project/
On requesting a secure page using the HTTPS protocol (https://), Serna initiates SSL connection.

li.p: The files residing in the DAV directory will then be shown.
In the editbox filename or in the file browser select the file to open. Click OK.
